title: Miley Cyrus has yet another tattoo on her neck after getting inked with new boyfriend Cody
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Miley Cyrus has added more body ink to her growing collection as she gets two tattoos in as many days.

The 26-year-old debuted her latest tattoo in a new post to her Instagram .

The black and white photo shows a number 92 etched on the back of her neck, in honour of the year she was born.

She captioned the picture "YEAR OF THE MONKEY".

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Miley also recently got tattooed with her new boyfriend Cody Simpson, 22.

She got a fine line love heart with a dragger through it on the back of her arm, while Cody got a skull and crossbones on the side of his chest.

Miley is not the only member of the family to have tattoos.

Her 19-year-old sister Noah already has several, including "mommy" and "daddy" on her fingers.

(Image: Instagram)

And their brother Trace, 31, who is also a musician, is completely covered in dramatic body art.

Miley recently went public with singer Cody, following her divorce from Liam Hemsworth and a brief fling with Kaitlynn Carter.

The hot new couple left fans stunned when they put on a very raunchy display in their own personal X-rated photo shoot.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In the jaw-dropping snap, the songstress stuffed her hands down her love's underwear while they posed the provocative shot in the mirror.

Meanwhile, Liam has found solace with fellow Aussie, Maddison Brown.

The pair were snapped holding hands in New York, and a source has told WHO magazine that Liam is taking everything steady.

The source said: "[The relationship is] very new. Liam is taking it slow but he's definitely interested in her."
description: Miley has added more tattoos to her collection, getting a new one on her neck just one day after getting a new one on her arm
